010package imagingbook.common.image;
011
012/**
013 * Enumeration type representing the available strategies for accessing pixel locations outside the image bounds.
014 *
015 * @author WB
016 * @see GridIndexer2D
017 */
018public enum OutOfBoundsStrategy {
019        /** Insert zero values. */
020        ZeroValues,
021        /** Insert the value of the nearest border pixel. */
022        NearestBorder,
023        /** Replicate the image by mirroring at its borders. */
024        MirrorImage,
025        /** Throws an exception when out-of-boundary coordinates are accessed. */
026        ThrowException;
027}
